text: I was hoping to be on early tonight, but due to a possible gas leak in my flat, I'm waiting for the gas board to arrive!
I liked a @YouTube video http://youtu.be/9-nYr8ljgGQ?a  WAKING UP TO A GAS LEAK!!
There is a gas leak behind our work so we are getting sent home early the fuck is this..
